attributes.action: allow university students to claim benefits.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: student loans do not go very far and due to the financial difficulties in the country it makes it harder for students to get part time jobs that fit in with their timetable. we as students should be able to claim benefits to help when times are hard. other than student loans, students recieve no other funding and find it difficult to live and pay for their university equipment and travel
